analysis.key_quote: This is a naked power grab by the President. It is not only illegal. It will undermine the professionalism and nonpartisan expertise that all Americans rely on.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, labeling it as an illegal power grab that threatens the professionalism and nonpartisan nature of the civil service, which aligns with concerns about politicization and the integrity of the merit-based system.
